nodes.text: The Star Tours Getaway Package was a package holiday advertised and sold by Star Tours Spacelines around 1 BBY. It consisted of three stopovers: the first one among the heights of Cloud City, for the Fantasy in the Sky Fireworks Pageant festivity, the second one on the Forest Moon of Endor, and the last one on Alderaan.

The Star Tours Getaway Package was mentioned in an in-universe commercial created for the queue area of Star Tours: The Adventures Continue—a reimagined Star Tours attraction in Disneyland and Disney's Hollywood Studios.
